Definition: Week end date of the weekly data observation (rolling 7 days of data)
Unique identifier for the product being tracked (foreign key to products table)
Unique identifier for the retail store location (foreign key to stores table)
Unique identifier for the retail banner/brand
Unique identifier for the parent account that owns the store(s)
Canadian province where the store is located
Menu price displayed to customers at the store
Discount amount applied to the menu price (NULL if no discount)
Unit price at which the retailer purchased the product from the supplier
Current quantity of units available in store inventory at the end of the week
Change in inventory quantity from the previous week
Estimated number of units sold during the week based on inventory changes
